com.drfl.twinstickshooter.tests

Class Tests

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.drfl.twinstickshooter.tests.Tests

  • public class Tests
extends java.lang.Object
    Unit tests for the Model/Controller packages

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tests() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setUpBefore()
      Runs before each test.
      static void setUpBeforeAll()
      Runs before all tests once.
      void testBulletsEnemy()
      Spawns enemy and tests if player hitting it with a bullet results in enemy losing health.
      void testEnemyAutoShootPlayer()
      Spawns enemy and tests shooting by allowing the enemy to hit the player and checking that player health drops.
      void testEnemyMovement()
      Spawns enemy and tests that enemy changes position over time.
      void testMovement()
      Tests 8-directional movement of the main character by checking whether the character moved as expected.
      void testScore()
      Spawns enemy and tests that score goes up if enemy's health drops to 0 or less.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public Tests()

    • Method Detail

      • setUpBeforeAll

        public static void setUpBeforeAll()
        Runs before all tests once. Initializes headless LibGDX.

      • setUpBefore

        public void setUpBefore()
        Runs before each test. Makes sure LibGDX has been initialized before running tests.

      • testScore

        public void testScore()
        Spawns enemy and tests that score goes up if enemy's health drops to 0 or less.

      • testEnemyMovement

        public void testEnemyMovement()
        Spawns enemy and tests that enemy changes position over time.

      • testEnemyAutoShootPlayer

        public void testEnemyAutoShootPlayer()
        Spawns enemy and tests shooting by allowing the enemy to hit the player and checking that player health drops.

      • testBulletsEnemy

        public void testBulletsEnemy()
        Spawns enemy and tests if player hitting it with a bullet results in enemy losing health.

      • testMovement

        public void testMovement()
        Tests 8-directional movement of the main character by checking whether the character moved as expected.
